update.releaseNotes: - Added forward [on/off] : Now you can forward all incoming messages to the sender from selected SIM (Note: You can check forward number from status) - Added sim [number] : Now you can change default SIM for calling and messaging - Added dial [USSD] : Now you can dial USSD codes from selected SIM - Changed pic [front/back] [n] : Now you can capture n images from specified camera with 2 seconds interval and sends email (Note: if n is not specified, only 1 pic is captured) - Removed pic [message] : Now show [message] will capture picture from front camera
